doc.field: Yoshio Kishi and Irene Yah-Ling Sun Collection
Yoshio Kishi and Irene Yah-Ling Sun Collection

This series contains video material collected by Kishi. The VHS and BetaMax portions contain commercial videos, as well as movies and television shows recorded off of the TV, including titles such as "21 Jump Street" (1989), "China" (1943), "The Hanoi Hilton" (1987), "Old San Francisco" (1927), and "Vengeance of Fu Manchu" (1967). This series also contains videos of Kishi's "Scrutable Images" of Asians and Asian Americans. Many cassettes contain the original notations and descriptions within the case.
Yoshio Kishi and Irene Yah-Ling Sun Collection
